entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Old Crow
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:50 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -42.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Old Crow Airport 3:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -42.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 56.3 km
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -50
Dewpoint: -47.7°C
Wind: W 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Ice fog. Temperature steady near minus 39.
entry.summary: Ice fog dissipating this afternoon then clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 39. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Temperature steady near minus 42.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 42. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 42.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 42. Wind chill minus 49 in the morning and minus 56 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
